in a way that is endurable (= possible to accept and deal with), even though it may be difficult, unpleasant, or painful: They were able to perform their duties effectively and endurably. The water was hot, but endurably so, once you got used to it. Synonym

She managed to make their lives run endurably, if not comfortably.
